sub_title: CHRO I Management Board at ERIKS
summary: Successful HR Executive known for strong business acumen and strategic vision; able to effectively translate business strategy into HR services and practices to achieve organization goals. Proven talent for steering organizations through transformation; able to sustain change efforts and cultural alignment. Devise leadership development strategy empowering talent to thrive in volatile, complex and ambiguous world. Establish best-in-class HR teams through mindful vision, professionalism, and leadership. Pragmatic, passionate, results-driven business partner. Fluent in Italian (native) and English; basic skills in Dutch and French.

[{'company': {'id': 40326, 'name': 'ERIKS', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/D4E0BAQGmFITjWGGAyg/company-logo_400_400/0/1688634910380?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=aqVT4Aza1f340G6ampp9FaFNMMY0Y9k440R7N8S9-7Q', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/eriks/', 'employees': {'start': 5001, 'end': 10000}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Uthecht, Nederland', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}, 'end': {'month': None, 'day': None, 'year': None}}, 'company': 'ERIKS', 'description': 'Part of SHV, ERIKS is a leading specialized industrial service provider and distributor. With a strong position in Europe and North America, alongside Asia, is present in 17 countries with 6500 employees. Size of business: between 1.5 and 2 billion EUR 

Hired to support the digital transformation and the growth and profitability improvement plans, part of the Management Board, direct report to the CEO.

HIGHLIGHTS:
•	Implemented strong leadership teams at country and central level by replacing one third of the leaders within the first 18 months, at the same time increased female in sr. management positions from 8% to 20% 
•	Lead the High Performing Organization workstream strengthening performance management, communication, and employee engagement practices
•	Strengthened and refocused HR community around business priorities (sales growth, centralization of digital initiative and Supply Chain), repurposed the HRIS system (Workday) accordingly
•	Introduced diversity and inclusion themes & practices together with accountability & feedback
•	During COVID quickly and successfully transitioned to virtual working, kept high levels of safety and engagement, smoothly transitioned back to a hybrid way of working', 'title': 'Chief Human Resources Officer (CHRO)', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 1032876, 'name': 'Staples Solutions', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFZD543Uy-KtA/company-logo_400_400/0/1537971642300?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=wgFT6cb8s3SP8CKDSSJXe2hMRUmtmOBlb_rhlKqJ1rI', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/staples-solutions/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam', 'date': {'start': {'month': 3, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}, 'end': {'month': 8, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Staples Solutions', 'description': 'Acquired in 2017 by Cerberus Capital Management, a private equity firm with $30 billion USD invested, Staples Solutions is a leading provider of workplace products, services, and solutions. Staples Europe was a subsidiary of Staples Ink, employed 10,000 associates, operated in 17 countries and generated €2.2 billion.

In this role I defined HR strategic plans to align with the goals of this new standalone company; I redefined the company culture, values, and ways of working in parallel with organizational priorities. I report directly to CEO and have an open line of communication with the Board. 

HIGHLIGHTS:

● Implemented cloud-based solution (Oracle) and introduced a new intranet to streamline and enhance internal communications within nine months from acquisition—on time and on budget.
● Redefined potential, introduced talent pool approach, and assessed top 120 managers against new standards. Cascaded approach down to entire organization; built development plans based on outcomes. 
● Developed and implemented sales force upskilling plan; restructured competency models and integrated performance management approach.
● Successfully dismissed retail business in UK and NL, which encompassed disengaging that line from the rest of the organization and reconfiguring HR’s priority and focus on B2B and online segments. 
● Currently supporting organization through a massive cost cutting initiative to generate €60 million EUR in savings. Oversee discharge of ~600 employees and coordinate decentralization process with 15 countries.', 'title': 'VP, Head of HR', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 3019, 'name': 'Staples', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQGuG0-kJW0uJg/company-logo_400_400/0/1663006569255?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=IqMA2sJGYFb9YTxB3sCDGeNfi8qKiFRXuiJVQX8Ezgw', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/staples/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2014}, 'end': {'month': 2, 'day': None, 'year': 2017}}, 'company': 'Staples', 'description': "Staples Inc. was the world's largest office products company with an annual turnover of $25 billion ranking second in the world of e-commerce sales. Staples Europe was a subsidiary of Staples, Inc., which employed 10,000 associates in 17 countries and generated €2.2 billion EUR in sales.

I was hired to define the European HR strategy and form an operating model aligned with global HR practices and local business priorities. I directed an HR team of 110+ recruiting and managing personnel in retail, online, and B2B operations. I managed a €10 million EUR budget. 

I was part of the European leadership team and reported directly to global CHRO (Boston) and indirectly to President of Staples Europe. 

HIGHLIGHTS: 

● Supported business transformation across Europe as Staples transitioned from a country-based to a channel-based organization.
● Improved compensation and benefits processes: revised salary review process; implemented retention bonus program; reviewed commission structure for salesforce. 
● Revamped performance management system to better manage employee progress, performance, and development relative to business priorities. Eliminated 90% of poor performers during year one. 
● Renewed training portfolio focusing on digital and blended learning for managers and sales representatives. 
● Oversaw workforce reduction effort, cutting total workforce by 20%. Retained HR service levels despite 12% staff reduction by leveraging available U.S. services.", 'title': 'VP, Head of HR Europe', 'employment_type': None}]}, {'company': {'id': 2327, 'name': 'Randstad Holding NV', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4E0BAQFqC--DBWZjDA/company-logo_400_400/0/1519855858406?e=1700092800&v=beta&t=8rUmdIzDi8MuNsTm-7XV-5BdM-9JDl3CVANKYL6K2wc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/company/randstad/', 'employees': {'start': 10001, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2007}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2009}, 'end': {'month': 12, 'day': None, 'year': 2013}}, 'company': 'Randstad', 'description': "Randstad Holding is a Dutch multinational operating in 38 countries with 37,930 employees; second largest HR services provider worldwide, €14 billion sales

I was promoted to fulfil a multifunctional role that encompassed advising client groups on process improvements and carrying Randstad’s rewards and performance strategies from concept to fruition. As part of that role, I also orchestrated HR due diligence and integration through mergers and acquisitions. 

HIGHLIGHTS:

HR SR BUSINESS PARTNER: supporting a portfolio with ~9,000 employees in Europe, Asia, and North America. 
● Analyzed the role of HR corporate and delivered recommendations to the executive board on the level of centralization - decentralization for each HR service.
● Implemented talent management process to review local talent pipeline in each country.

DIRECTOR OF REWARDS & PERFORMANCE MANAGEMENT: Served as a key member of the global HR leadership team managing compensation and mobility plans specifically for Randstad’s top 400 executives. Coordinated HR due diligence and integration through mergers and acquisitions.
● Designed and executed the Group Total Rewards Strategy.
● Reshaped Randstad's Global Mobility Policy. 
● Supervised HR integration of €7 billion EUR staffing firm, Vedior. Merger doubled Randstad’s global workforce and dramatically expanded its presence in strategic markets virtually worldwide.
  ~ Developed roadmap for integration of cultures, HR processes, and compensation systems.
  ~ Completed integration of Randstad and Vedior rewards systems for top 400 executives in one year.
● Created and implemented a Share Purchase Plan for top senior managers with a rejuvenated bonus system; extended to Vedior employees in 20 countries.
● Implemented global job grading system and salary benchmarking. 
● Conducted HR due diligence and integration for acquisition of SFN Group with Randstad US ($2 billion USD revenue) and FuijStaff with Randstad Japan (€500 million EUR revenue).", 'title': 'HR Senior Business Partner | Director, Rewards & Performance Management inc.
